direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve asset conversion operations, specifically converting dust assets to BNB.
Both methods access and manipulate asset-related data, though for different purposes (conversion vs. dividend record).
Both methods involve sending signed requests with similar parameter handling and exception management.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require the initialization of the RequestHandler for sending signed requests.
Environment setup is required before performing asset conversion operations.
Both methods involve verifying asset conversions and handling similar exceptions.
